original_text: The whole earth will become empty. Nothing will remain. The Lord has said that this punishment will certainly happen.
korean_text: 땅이 온전히 공허하게 되고 온전히 황무하게 되리라 여호와께서 이 말씀을 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: The whole earth will become empty
sentences.korean_translation: 온 땅이 텅 비게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: that this punishment will certainly happen
